Reviews.Title: “Reasonable stay”
Reviews.Author: Brammycot
Reviews.Content: stayed villa 3 nights short 15 min walk lido docks easy theres friendly welcome staff ground floor sadly dark hotel time couldnt swap clean cosy breakfast fine hot menu plenty cereals pastries etc overall reasonable stay call 3 star fine stay looking round city nice centre annoy charge 5 euros hours wifi paying night expect free cafes

HotelInfo.Name: Villa Tiziana Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via A Gritti 3, 30126 Venice, Italy
